subject: Running
Cancer
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: After slogging through radiation and hormone therapy to treat his prostate cancer, Dana Jennings has taken up running again, with his sights set on running the New York Marathon in the fall.
snippet: After slogging through radiation and hormone therapy to treat his prostate cancer, Dana Jennings has taken up running again, with his sights set on running the New York Marathon in the fall.
